Мастер фраза для определения максимально: Well, that old thing almost tore me to pieces for its gold! gold! gol
archiv_Восточная часть Чистилища. Два ле:
Eastern part of Purgatory.
Two lecture halls.
The first belongs to Iray, the second to instructor Ricard.
archiv_Восточная часть Чистилища. Всего:
Eastern part of Purgatory.
There are only two dormitories.
archiv_Восточная часть Чистилища. Обменн:
Eastern part of Purgatory.
Exchange point for consumables.
archiv_Юго-восточная часть Чистилища. Мо:
Southeastern part of Purgatory.
You can eat and talk with the reapers.
archiv_Юг Чистилища. Ирэй советует держа:
South of Purgatory.
Iray advises you to stay away from this place!
Northeastern part of Purgatory.
Exchange point for armor and weapons.
archiv_Север Чистилища. Любимое место Си:
North of Purgatory.
Sidrin Ruri's favorite place.
archiv_Западная часть Чистилища. Вход в:
Western part of Purgatory.
Entrance to the soul purification and distribution building.
archiv_Удар в голову с шансом 25% оглуша:
A blow to the head has a 25% chance of stunning the enemy.
A blow to the torso weakens target’s physical protection by 35%.
A blow to the hands weakens target’s physical attack by 35%.
Hitting the legs reduces the target's speed by 35%.
archiv_Последовательность ходов зависит:
The sequence of moves depends on the “Speed” parameter,
the higher it is, the more often you can act.
Before any enemy attacks, you will see
one of three indicators.
archiv_Магическая атака. Её невозможно к:
Magic attack.
It cannot be counterattacked with a normal skill. From her
It’s recommended to dodge it using the “Dodge” skill
or block with the “Protection” skill.
archiv_Физическая атака. Её можно отбить:
Physical attack.
It can be returned to the enemy using the “Counterattack” skill.
archiv_Особое умение. Это усиливающие ум:
A special skill.
These are strengthening skills, or combat skills that penetrate
“Evasion” and “Counterattack”. It is recommended prevent
the use of such a skill using “stun”.
archiv_Слитки жизни восстанавливают 50%:
Life bars restore 50% of received wounds (HP).
Magic ingots restore 50% of magical energy (MP).
Adrenaline bars restore 50% of physical
energy(TP).
Attack Ingot increases damage from physical attacks
by 50%.
Protection ingot reduces damage from physical
damage by 50%.
Magic barrier reduces damage from magical
damage by 50%.
The amplifier can be activated both in the battle itself,
and outside, having prepared in advance.
Use consumable equipment wisely
Otherwise, you may find yourself in an awkward position.
archiv_Вне битвы усилитель “атаки” помож:
Outside of battle, the attack amplifier will help bypass physical
obstacles.
A protection ingot will reduce incoming damage from physical threats.
Like stones, blade and other things.
The magic barrier works similarly - it protects against
magic damage.
archiv_Пока ты не попал в поле зрения вр:
Until you come into the enemy's field of view, they will not
to react.
If found, you will have several options.
Fight, or try to escape.
Assess the situation and decide what is best to do.
archiv_На случай, если вы заблудитесь, у:
In case you get lost, every reaper has
local map of the area.
Black squares show an area where you have not been.
Everything else is a miniature map of the area.
The Rioma icon is a reaper in a gray helmet, where is it located?
he, there you are.
archiv_Зед, скажи, что это за штуковина?: Zed, tell me, what is this thing?
This is the first time I've seen this...
Ehh... So be it, I’ll tell you.
archiv_Риом, что ты знаешь о том, как по:
Riom, what do you know about how reapers
are born?
archiv_Немного... Отец рассказывал мне о:
A little... My father told me that the reaper's body
is created from the dead human flesh.
archiv_Да, тела жнецов сделаны из челове:
Yes, the reaper's bodies are made from human 
remains. First you need to find a corpse at the initial
stage decomposition.
archiv_За тем на нем установить “Перенос:
Then install a “Carrier” on it,
who delivers the corpse to Purgatory.
archiv_Прости, что перебиваю... но как ж:
Sorry to interrupt... but what about the rule
of the world of the Living and the Dead?
archiv_“Объекты мира Живых не могут попа:
"Objects from the world of the Living cannot enter 
the world of the Dead."
archiv_Немного технологий и магии... и т:
A little technology and magic... and you
successfully bypass this rule!
archiv_За счет чистой энергии “Переносчи:
Due to clean energy “Carrier"
dissolves the body and transports it to the right place.
archiv_Дальше труп перерабатывается в ор:
The corpse is then processed into organic
mass, and then this mechanism creates from
biomass and the purified soul... of the reaper.
archiv_Люди вас еще не застали за таким:
Haven't people caught you committing such 
blasphemy yet?
archiv_Благодаря тому, что они не видят:
Thanks to the fact that they don't see us and
a couple of invisibility bars for devices - no. 
And the body transfer procedure is not long.
archiv_Чем ты занимаешься, как Вероломге:
What do you do as a Werolomger?
What are your responsibilities?
archiv_Та ничего интересного... Слежу за:
But nothing interesting...
I monitor the production of reapers, improve 
this machine and head the medical corps.
archiv_Недавно решил активно задействова:
I recently decided to actively involve
prosthetic technology.
archiv_Что-то не видно ни одного жнеца с:
For some reason, not a single reaper with a tin can 
instead of a limb is in sight.
archiv_Это потому, что протезы требуют п:
This is because dentures require constant
energy supply and in general...
use of an artificial hand - temporary
solution.
archiv_Легче найти отрубленную руку како:
It's easier to find the severed hand of someone
deceased and with the help of an ingot of life
attach it.
